actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice

official_title: To amend title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to reduce the amount of non-Federal funds required to be provided to obtain Federal funds under subpart 1 of part E of such title.
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to increase (from 50 to 75 percent) the Federal share of funds provided under the drug control and system improvement grant program.

titles.title: To amend title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to reduce the amount of non-Federal funds required to be provided to obtain Federal funds under subpart 1 of part E of such title.
